channel.title: Adding chaotics to a PI 317?
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm trying to add chaotics to my 317 project insanity, but I don't quite know how. I've tried ripping some files from another PI just to test if that would work but that didn't.. I appreciate if someone could explain me how to do this. I heard you need to do stuff with .dat's and Ints, but that doesn't say alot to me.
Cheers

item.title: Adding chaotics to a PI 317?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

This is the wrong section. Post your client related questions here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html

Also, as long as you use the correct coding and models it SHOULD WORK. Depending on what you are adding you might need to add a new model header for your client, which can be found in the tutorial section I’m sure.

Read full topic
